import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { buyStock } from '../Store' import './Account.css' function Account() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const transactions = useSelector((state) => state.transactions) const users = useSelector((state) => state.users) const [selectedUser, setSelectedUser] = React.useState(users[0].id) const handleBuyStock = (userId, stock, amount) => { dispatch(buyStock({ userId, stock, amount })) } return (

Account Heading

Your random tagline here

Total Balance:{' '} {users.find((user) => user.id === selectedUser).balance}
Total Tokens:{' '} {JSON.stringify( users.find((user) => user.id === selectedUser).tokens )}
Transactions
{transactions.map((tx, index) => ( ))}
User ID Type Stock Amount Timestamp
{tx.userId} {tx.type} {tx.stock} {tx.amount} {tx.timestamp}
) } export default Account
